message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced split. Take it or watch the money shrink further!
Considering the inflation, let's meet closer to the middle. This is a fairer split given the circumstances.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The money is literally disappearing.  My last offer is very fair.  Take it or leave it!
